title: Argentinian "Type Mafia"
content:
Last saturday Luis Siquot (designer of ITC Juanita, ITC Cali, ITC Portago, ITC arecibo) gave a little conference in Buenos Aires.   
   
This is the picture of the event:   
 [http://www.geocities.com/sinserif/primera\_convocatoria.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107173342/http:/www.geocities.com/sinserif/primera_convocatoria.gif)   
(if the link doesn't work, copy the url and paste in the browser)   
   
Regards.   
   
Ramiro Espinoza.
author: Ramiro Espinoza
